adjectives.description: interested (comparative more interested, superlative most interested)

entries.meaning: Having or showing interest (attention or curiosity).
examples: I'm very interested in going to see that play.

definitionGroups.group: (less common) Having an interest (stake); being a stakeholder; motivated by considerations of self-interest; self-serving.

entries.meaning: Owning a share of a company; being a shareholder.
simple past tense and past participle of interest
